channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rivian CEO says midprice EV sales are still 50% Tesla: ‘That’s not a reflection of a healthy market’
item.description: Lackluster demand for electric cars in the U.S. isn’t because Americans don’t want them, RJ Scaringe said. There’s just few good options.

item.title: Microsoft Confirms Windows Security Update Breaks VPN Connections
item.description: Here we go again: another Microsoft Windows update, another feature broken as a result. This time it’s VPN access. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: e/OS/, Shiftphone8, And The Quest For Privacy-Focused Smartphones
item.description: Google is not Android, and Android is not Google. Step forward, Murena, which leverages the open-source Android project to build a privacy-focused e/O...

item.title: ‘Alien’ Comet 3I/ATLAS Is Getting Brighter And Greener, Scientists Say
item.description: Hawaii’s Gemini North telescope has captured new images of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS with a green glow as it remerges from behind the sun.

item.title: Elon Musk says there will be ‘no poverty’ in the future, implying Ray Dalio’s multi-million Trump Account pledge will be essentially redundant
item.description: "It is certainly a nice gesture," Musk said. "But there will be no poverty in the future and so no need to save money."

item.title: AI Meta-Hallucinations In Mental Health Are Giving Out Unsafe Self-Explanatory Psychological Guidance
item.description: Besides AI hallucinations, there are AI meta-hallucinations. Those are especially bad in a mental health context. Here's the skinny. An AI Insider sco...

item.title: A federal investigation is underway after Nevada’s safety regulator suddenly dropped violations against Boring Company
item.description: Lawyers and regulators say the Nevada state agency’s handling of the safety investigation went against procedure.

item.title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry piles misery onto tech stocks after Oracle fails to close AI debt deal
item.description: Of course, Burry has a conflict of interest in the form of a $1.1 billion short bet against AI stocks. So take his doom-mongering with a pinch of salt...

item.title: Ford’s Staggering Write-Down On EVs Is Latest Example Of Climate Folly
item.description: The trillions of dollars spent—and still being spent—on reducing emissions have largely been wasted and should cease as soon as possible.

item.title: Exclusive: Swedish startup automating mechanical, electrical, and plumbing design for commercial buildings raises $20 million in seed round
item.description: Endra says it can reduce the time needed to design electrical systems from months to hours.

item.title: Trump announces $1,776 ‘warrior dividend’ for troops as economic worries persist
How the Trump administration is set to upend 50 years of fair-lending laws
In 5-to-4 vote, Bank of England opts to cut interest rates
These 6 store rewards programs have the best perks and are easy to use
Germany to issue a record $600 bln in bonds next year
Musk predicts AI will create 'universal high income' and make saving money unnecessary
item.description: Elon Musk dismisses Trump savings accounts, claiming AI will create "universal high income" and eliminate poverty, making saving unnecessary.

item.title: PayPal plans to launch bank serving small businesses around the US
item.description: PayPal files with Utah and the FDIC to launch PayPal Bank, an industrial loan company offering small business lending and FDIC-insured savings account...

item.title: FDA announces recall of frozen dessert pints over possible 'small stones'
item.description: The FDA announced a voluntary recall of non-dairy frozen dessert pints sold at stores nationwide over the potential presence of small stones.

item.title: Scott Bessent says real affordability relief, 'substantial drop' in inflation coming soon
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts inflation relief and tax refunds for Americans in 2026, forecasting a "bountiful" economic year ahead for Ma...

item.title: iRobot co-founder says FTC's opposition to Amazon deal was 'wrong-minded' following bankruptcy filing
item.description: iRobot filed for bankruptcy and will be bought by Chinese manufacturer after Amazon's $1.4 billion acquisition was blocked by the FTC on antitrust gro...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
